channel.title: Da Vinci on Jiaming Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Da Vinci on Jiaming Zhang

item.title: dARt Vinci: Egocentric Data Collection for Surgical Robot Learning at Scale
item.description: Data scarcity has long been an issue in the robot learning community. Particularly, in safety-critical domains like surgical applications, obtaining high-quality data can be especially difficult. It poses challenges to researchers seeking to exploit recent advancements in reinforcement learning and imitation learning, which have greatly improved generalizability and enabled robots to conduct tasks autonomously.
